attributes.additional_details: this go's to prove that Mr Khan is against democracy in the old day this would be treason we the undersigned want Mr Khan to be Fire or Resign
attributes.background:
Sadiq Khan did not listen to david cameron when he told his party 
to unite and move forward with Brexit Mr Khan did not listen and instead wanted to separate London from the rest of the Uk

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Cabinet Ministers to be sacked, fired or which call on them to resign.
